ygData.subject: RE: Bard's Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the Mistmoore Battle Drum and the Lute of the Gypsy princess does improve the songs they coincide with.  I personally have the Mistmoore Battle Drums
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the Mistmoore Battle Drum and the Lute of the Gypsy princess does
improve the songs they coincide with. I personally have the Mistmoore
Battle Drums and the stat improving songs do go up and I believe the run
song is faster (although I don't think you will notice until level 30).

Mentia
Level 32 Bard
Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 7:28 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Unfortunately, as far as I know, there are no "advanced" instruments
currently in the game. If there were, you can rest assured that tidbit of
info would get posted to this list. The bard petition that was submitted a
few weeks back requested that Verant add magical instruments but so far the
battle drum is the only one in the game. I have never heard of a harp
existing in the game but I haven't been in the bards guild since the last
patch so don't know if it has been added or not. Have you seen a harp in
game or were you using it as a hypothetical example?

Galtin of E'ci

> I was under the impression that the more "advanced" instruments (i.e. more
> expensive ones or ones found on monsters) would have a higher multiplier
> on
> songs. Like a harp found on a creature would mean that healing went up
> higher than using a mandolin.
>
>
>
>
